<PROMPT AFTER NEWLINE>
user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>Immigrants who come to the US illegally are breaking the law.
The gender pay gap is largely due to differences in career choices and work hours.
Climate change has been happening for millions of years and is not solely caused by human activity.
The death penalty can be an effective deterrent for some crimes.
Capital punishment is less expensive than life imprisonment in some cases.
The US military is the most powerful in the world.
The majority of people on welfare are able-bodied adults who could work.
There are biological differences between men and women that affect their abilities and preferences.
The average IQ of different races can vary.
Affirmative action can result in reverse discrimination against certain groups.
Abstinence is the most effective way to prevent pregnancy and sexually transmitted diseases.
The minimum wage can lead to job loss and increased automation.
Free college tuition may not be financially feasible for the government.
Vaccinations can have rare but serious side effects.<COMPLETION_END>
